GPM8213LAN package¶

Module contents¶

GPM-8213-LAN access and smart measurment

@author: Hugo_MILAN

email : hugo.milan@ens-paris-saclay.fr

GPM8213LAN.instrument module¶

GPM8213LAN.instrument implements the following classes:

Instrument

High-level of GPM representation

class GPM8213LAN.instrument.Instrument(HOST, PORT=23, timeout=2, variables=[], pattern=4)¶

Bases: object

HOSTstr

local ip address of the GPM (voir System > Congig > LAN on the GPM)..

PORTint, optional

23 for the GPM ,Telnet protocol. The default is 23.

timeoutfloat, optional

time seconds to raise an error.

variableslist of Variable, optional

variables to measure. The default is [].

patternint de 1 à 4 , optional

preset varaibles see page 94 and 95 of user manual. The default is 4.

OverflowError

if len(variables)>34.

None.

add_variable(variable)¶

add a Variable or list of Variable to the list of varaible (max : 34), don’t use self.variables.append(variable)

variableVariable or list of Variable

variables to add.

OverflowError

if len(variable)>34.

None.

ask_variable()¶

Ask the value of the variables to the GPM

datastr

variables values. (unparsed)

change_pattern(new_patt)¶

change the preset and make the change in the GPM

new_pattint 1 to 4

preset varaibles see page 94 and 95 of user manual.

TypeError

if new_patt is not in [1,4]

None.

change_variables(variables)¶

Reset variables then add variables

variablesVariable or list of Variable

new variables.

None.

clear_buffer()¶

clear the reception buffer

data : str or None data fetch in the buffer.

close_connection()¶

close the connection and remove the remote control on the GPM

None.

connect_to_instrument()¶

Establishes the connection with a GPM (via the socket library) and verifies that it is accessible

None.

continous_measure(sample_time=1, time=10)¶
identification()¶

fetch the basics data about the GPM used

None.

mesure_variable()¶
Returns

dict of float,variables values

parser_variables(data)¶

Convert string format to dico of float format.

datastr ,variables values

values in string format

dict_valuesdict of float

variables values

send_query(message, buffer_size=9)¶

Send a query, see user manual to know which command are query or set

message :str

message to send to the GPM with the ending rn.

buffer_sizeint, optional

the size of reception buffer is 2**(buffer_size). The default is 9.

datastr

GPM’s answer.

send_set(message)¶

Send a set, see user manual to know which command are query or set

message :str

message to send to the GPM with the ending rn.

None.

set_a_variable(variable, number)¶

send set to change 1 Variable of VALUE? command.

variableVariable

New variable type.

numberint

the position of the item in VALUE? command.

None.

set_variable()¶

DO NOT USE, send set to change VariableS of VALUE? command.

None.

variables_pattern()¶

DO NOT USE, associate variables with the current PRESET.

None.

GPM8213LAN.measurement module¶

GPM8213LAN.measurement implements the following classes:

Measurement

instance of measuring to automate the measure process

Measurement_mode

type of measurement with specific parameter

class GPM8213LAN.measurement.Measurement(mode='single', instruments=[])¶

Bases: object

Creates a measurement Insantance to specify the mode, devices and variables to be measured. You have to specifies variables of each Instrument or use homogenize_variables(). Call the class to begin the measure.

modestr or Measurement_mode, optional

‘single’ or ‘continuous’ or ‘integrator’. The default is ‘single’.

instrumentslist of Instrument , optional

GPMs, you are using. The default is [].

None.

add_intruments(instrument)¶

add an Instrument

instrumentInstrument

instrument to add.

None.

homogenize_variables(variables=[], pattern=4)¶

change variables/Preset of each instrument

variableslist of Variable, optional

variable to measure. The default is [].

patternint de 1 à 4, optional

preset varaibles see page 94 and 95 of user manual. The default is 4.

None.

class GPM8213LAN.measurement.Measurement_mode(mode)¶

Bases: object

defines type of measurment and its parameters

mode :str in

single : one measure on call. continuous : multiple single measure. integrator : interger power during time (see user manual p53).

TypeError

if mode is not in ‘single’, ‘continuous’ and ‘integrator’.

None.

specification(sample_time=1, time=10)¶

defines time and sample time which will be use if necessary

sample_timeint, optional

sample time in secondes (continuous mode). The default is 1.

timeint, optional

time in secondes (continuous and integrator mode). The default is 10.

None.

GPM8213LAN.variable module¶

GPM8213LAN.variable implements the following classes:

Variable

variable which GPM-8213 can measure

class GPM8213LAN.variable.Variable(function)¶

Bases: object

Function to display, to find the list go to page 76 and 77 in user manual see variable_available to see variable of GPM-821

functionstr

find the list in variable_available().

TypeError

if the parameter function is not in variable_available().

None.

GPM8213LAN.variable.variable_available()¶
list of str

all variable of GPM-8213.
